articles.title: Novak Djokovic beats Cameron Norrie to reach Wimbledon final
articles.description: Novak Djokovic has advanced to the Wimbledon final with a four-set win over Britain's Cameron Norrie. Djokovic will seek his seventh championship at the All England Club on Sunday against Nick Kyrgios.
articles.content:
Novak Djokovic is headed to another Wimbledon final after knocking out Britain's Cameron Norrie in four sets.
Djokovic dropped the first set before closing out Norrie 2-6, 6-3, 6-2, 6-4 victory.
A … [+796 chars]

articles.title: Oregon Ducks get commitment from QB Dante Moore, No. 8 college football recruit for 2023
articles.description: QB Dante Moore, who is the No. 8 overall recruit in the 2023 ESPN 300 and the No. 3 pocket-passer, has committed to play for Oregon and new coach Dan Lanning, he told ESPN.
articles.content:
Five-star quarterback Dante Moore has committed to the Oregon Ducks, he announced Friday on SportsCenter.

articles.title: Carolina Hurricanes send defenseman Tony DeAngelo to Philadelphia for three draft picks
articles.description: The Carolina Hurricanes traded defenseman Tony DeAngelo and a 2022 seventh-round draft pick to Philadelphia for a fourth-round pick in 2022, third round pick in 2023 and a second-round choice in 2024.

articles.title: UFC fighter Alexander Volkanovski has broken thumb, out 12 weeks
articles.description: Alexander Volkanovski will undergo surgery for a broken left thumb suffered in his fight vs. Max Holloway and will require 12 weeks for recovery, he announced on social media.
articles.content:
Alexander Volkanovski suffered a broken left thumb during last weekend's title defense against Max Holloway, the UFC champ revealed on social media on Thursday night.

articles.title: St. Louis Cardinals' Albert Pujols, Detroit Tigers' Miguel Cabrera to participate in 2022 MLB All-Star Game
articles.description: Future Hall of Famers Albert Pujols and Miguel Cabrera will each participate in the MLB All-Star Game in July.
articles.content:
Sluggers Albert Pujols of the St. Louis Cardinals and Miguel Cabrera of the Detroit Tigers will participate in the 2022 All-Star Game, commissioner Rob Manfred announced Friday.

articles.title: Detroit Red Wings trade for St. Louis Blues regular-season star goalie Ville Husso
articles.description: In addition to acquiring Ville Husso from the Blues, the Red Wings have signed the 27-year-old goalie to a three-year contract.
articles.content:
MONTREAL -- The Detroit Red Wings have acquired St. Louis Blues goalie Ville Husso, who was a pending unrestricted free agent.
